file_content.text: Signal trouble. I'll need a moment.
Too bad about the ship. But hey, we got the Shining Man's log. Scorched or not, must be something on the conspirators in there.
It's a shame about the Gormak, and the ship.
But that holodisc... damaged or not, it'll be a treasure trove of intelligence on the conspirators.
Cut that a little closer than I like, but the conversation with the Gormak was... sparkling.
I suppose it's up to headquarters now--to pull the conspirators' data off that disc, I mean.
Pity about the ship, but really, this worked out nicely.
That data disc holds proof of the Shining Man's connection to the conspirators. The Fixers on Dromund Kaas will be excited to examine it.
Particles from the ship's destruction will poison its chamber for eighty-one days.
But you walk away with proof of the Shining Man's connection to my former benefactors. Is that success?
It's a good lead, but we still don't know what the Shining Man was doing here.
I wish we knew more.
We got what we came for--hard evidence and information on the enemy.
I'd call this a victory.
Bully for us.
Then it's time to go.
No time to enjoy the scenery, then.
All ends well.
We have scraps of data, but we don't even know why the Shining Man came to Voss. Now we've lost our only lead.
This is a disaster.
Yeah, well--you get your comm working?
We'll find them. We'll stop them. That's what's important.
At least the scenery's been nice?
If these conspirators are any good, we won't ever know all they've done.
It is your nature to remain ignorant. Be grateful for understanding that much.
Daughter of my family. Forgive this demand.
Son of my family. Forgive this demand.
Friend of Bas-Ton. I hoped not to speak again.
The interpreters of prophecy contacted. They wish to give a message.
I've never heard of them. Something to do with the Mystics?
Interpreters of prophecy?
They study what Mystics see. They advise our leaders.
Go ahead.
I haven't been married a week, and already I'm doing your friends favors.
Family is always trouble.
Say, aren't the commandos after you? Something about sacred carvings?
Shouldn't you be in jail?
I have not been judged.
The interpreters have been watching you and the Nightmare Lands. They say the Chamber of Ashes was set ablaze.
They say a prophecy speaks of this, of you. You will meet the Three--those who govern Voss.
Tell them I'm on my way now.
It would be an honor.
I don't understand--what prophecy? Why do the Three care?
A prophecy about me?
I do not know.
I'm in a bit of a hurry to get offworld. Maybe it can wait.
I don't like this.
You would be an honored guest. But I can say nothing to convince you.
The Three await you in the capitol. I am proud of you, my kin.
The Three await you in the capitol.
Go to the Sacred Flame. The marriage must be soon.
Please leave our home.
I will return with what you need.
If he's not back in fifteen minutes, I say we torch this place before the commandos come.
He's been gone awhile. Perhaps threats weren't the best approach.
You're sure we can trust him?
I've examined our escape routes. If Therod-Ton is caught by the commandos, we'll need them.
Your reliance on family loyalty could become a vulnerability.
Outsider! It is done. The carvings... they will guide.
There is an outsider--Murbek Gehn--who can show safe passage. Go now, before the commandos find me.
If this works, I'll be out of your life. Goodbye, Therod-Ton.
Hope we don't meet again.
Take care of yourself, and your family.
I hope you find peace.
I tend to the wounded.
Go. We must mourn.
You'll take the fall for this, and you'll keep me out of it... or else I'll be back.
Confess, but don't involve me.
Nightmare Lands, Chamber of Ashes, prophecies... let's find where the Shining Man really came from.
Now we find where the Shining Man came from. We hope the answers are worth it.
You can't help but feel for them a little. But if the Shining Man really came out of the Nightmare Lands... I guess we need to know.
Let's hope the Shining Man left something in the Nightmare Lands for us to find.
The path of the Shining Man is before you.
Perhaps it is destined.
The Mystics haven't spoken.
Not to us. We may hope.
Outsider. Where is my brother?
I did everything I could, but I was too late. He died thinking of his family.
I'm sorry; he's dead.
He was also... helping me with something. With his dying breath, he told me to go to you.
Bas-Ton thought of you as family; mourn with us.
You were Bas-Ton's friend. This is time to mourn.
You would see the Nightmare Lands. Bas-Ton asked about the sacred carvings.
Bas-Ton's alive, but the men who took him were criminals. I had to get him offworld.
He had to go into hiding.
Offworld.
He needs to stay hidden for now--and I need your help to reach the Nightmare Lands.
You must rest. We must all...
This is not--we should wait...
Bas-Ton's dead. He was helping me reach the Nightmare Lands, so now you're going to pick up his slack.
No time for mourning--talk!
How did this happen?
You didn't save him.
I know the Nightmare Lands. Bas-Ton asked about the sacred carvings. I did not know it was for you.
The carvings are protected heritage. Only a Voss may study them.
There must be a way. Bas-Ton thought you could show me.
Help me see them, please.
Just give me directions. Guards won't stop me.
I'll find my own way in.
You would violate every tradition.
Bas-Ton prized your friendship. We must honor that.
Only Voss see the carvings... you must be Voss. Become one of our family.
What does joining your family entail?
How would that work?
Nothing would please me more. I think Bas-Ton would say the same.
That's very kind.
Family or not, will anyone see me as Voss?
No one would accept that.
We would. It would last long enough.
Phi-Ton. Are you willing?
I am.
A father finds a wife. Bas-Ton never did this for me.
Join our family in marriage.
Yana-Ton. Are you willing?
I am.
Bas-Ton was to choose my husband. He never did.
Join our family in marriage.
You don't have to do this. Not for me or your father.
You're sure about this?
I knew there was something special between us.
[Flirt] You really do care.
Bas-Ton wanted to help. So do I.
It isn't real.
What can I say? We've got a wedding to plan.
A Voss marriage? Let's do it.
There is joy in that.
With time, we would overwhelm with ceremonial beauty. Not now.
We mourn later. Make preparations. Go to the Sacred Flame in the city.
You will be married today. You will see the carvings of Nightmare Lands. Bas-Ton's wishes fulfilled.
How about this--get me to those carvings, and you don't lose any more family members.
I'm tired of pathetic games.
You insult our father.
Look, just get me to those carvings, or you're going to lose more family members.
Do I have to threaten you?
Bas-Ton felt you were family!
The carvings are safe. Commandos guard them.
But I could enter. I could record.
This is wrong.
Bas-Ton is dead. I will not mourn his children.
Just act natural and don't warn anyone. I'll be waiting.
Smart choice.
You're feeling betrayed, but if it helps, it's just business.
Don't take it personally.
She'll bleed, but she won't die. Consider it incentive.
Be quick. [Hurt Yana-Ton]
It hurts...
He'll bleed, but he won't die. Consider it incentive.
Be quick. [Hurt Phi-Ton]
You shot me...
Find my brother. Find Bas-Ton.
This came to us. It speaks to you.
Hello, agent. Hope you get this in time, because your friend Bas-Ton doesn't have long.
He's safe for now, but... you know the drill. This stays between us.
You want him back, come to these coordinates. It's out in the Gormak lands, but that shouldn't be a problem for you.
We do not know him. The message came when Bas-Ton went into the city.
Stay here. I'm going to find him.
I'll take care of it.
My father says you are like none other, so I must trust you.
I've put your father in danger. I'll do everything I can to bring him back.
I'm truly sorry about this.
If he dies--if you die--I will put aside tea and avenge you.
My father trusted you, outsider. I trust you. Call on us, we come to your side.
I need to go. Breathe a word to your commandos, and Bas-Ton isn't the only one who'll suffer.
Tell no one, understand?
You're great with families. And by the way--no ransom demand means Bas-Ton's probably dead already....
His family does care for him. Let's try to bring him back, shall we?
My first hostage crisis. I'll follow your lead.
The kidnapper called him by his Voss name. I don't think he knows who Bas-Ton really is.
I've never rescued anyone. I will pay attention.
...this is why commandos exist.
I was one, uncle. They are imperfect.
Outsider. Forgive us. No tea is prepared. Would you... look at something?
Show me what you've got. I'll return the favor.
[Flirt] Kind of forward...
I was unclear.
You believe in the commandos.
I believe in my father's judgment.
Outsider. There's something you must see.
Something's wrong. Tell me.
What's going on?
Now how can I resist a line like that.
[Flirt] For you? Anything.
This is not the time.
I'm not interested. Where's your father?
I need to see Bas-Ton.
I cannot help you, outsider.
Be quick. [Hurt Yana-Ton]
Be quick. [Hurt Phi-Ton]
